entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Hunters Point
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
